welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Flawil, a charming Swiss town known for its scenic beauty and rich history. We are excited to have you here and invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and enjoy all that Flawil has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Altenrhein Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hohenems-Dornbirn Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for VIP and private flights, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Friedrichshafen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zurich Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zurich Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Zurich Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
